titleStmt.title: The castell of Christians and fortresse of the faithfull beseiged, and defended, now almost sixe thowsand yeares. VVritten by Iohn VVolton, on e of the Cathederal Church in Exetor.
titleStmt.author: Woolton, John, 1535?-1594.

publicationStmt.publisher: By J. C[harlewood] for Thomas Sturrup; dwellinge in Paules churchyard, at the signe of the George,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; printer's name from STC.
Leaf K4 torn; print faded and show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paules churchyard, at the signe of the George
